statements: DELETE FROM smart_light_fixture_data WHERE location_id = '1a2b3c4d-5e6f-7g8h-9i0j-1k2l3m4n5o' AND sensor_value >= 50.0;
DELETE FROM smart_light_fixture_data WHERE sensor_type = 'motion_sensor' AND timestamp < '2022-07-01';
DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 3 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM light_fixtures WHERE location = 'Kitchen' AND sensor_id = 123;
DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND light_status = TRUE;
DELETE FROM smart_light_fixture_data WHERE location = 'Living Room' AND energy_usage > 50
DELETE FROM lighting_schedule WHERE days_of_week = 'Monday,Wednesday,Thursday' AND end_time < '18:00'
DELETE FROM notification_logs WHERE fixture_id = 100 AND notification_type = 'maintenance';
